name: Sandra Lee’s Chicken Tenders
ingredients: 1 Tbsp lemon juice or juice from 1/2 lemon
2 Tbsp orange juice (adjust amount for desired dressing consistency)
instructions: Soak chicken in buttermilk, toss into flour, shake off and dip in milk again, then crumbs.
Fry until done (my deep fryer is 4 min. 30 sec.).
